Name: SQ_Z1_RatCatcher
Description: The cook needs 5 pieces of rat meat to keep the Tail fed. The rats nest in the walls between Cars 1 and 3.

Objectives.Description: Deliver the meat to the Cook

Name: SQ_Z1_MedicineRun
Description: An injured Tailie is dying of infection. Find antiseptic in the Sickbay stores of Car 8.

Objectives.Description: Return the Antiseptic to the Injured Tailie

Name: SQ_Z1_KronoleCleanup
Description: The Kronole dealer is poisoning the Tail. Deal with them by force, persuasion, or cunning.

Objectives.Description: (Optional) Persuade the Dealer to stop selling
Report back to Old Man Pike

Name: SQ_Z1_TheWorkshop
Description: The Tail's mechanic can teach you to craft weapons and gear. Gather materials and forge your first weapon.

Objectives.Description: Craft a Reinforced Shiv at the workbench

Name: SQ_Z1_ListeningPost
Description: Scattered intel documents reveal the Jackboots' patrol schedules and weak points.

Name: SQ_Z1_AshasTriage
Description: Dr. Asha needs help organizing the Sickbay. Complete her medical training to unlock her triage option in the Medicine Allocation choice.

Objectives.Description: Speak to Dr. Asha in the Sickbay (Car 6)

Name: SQ_Z1_NixOneNetwork
Description: The Tail's black market needs a new supplier. Establish trade routes through the maintenance tunnels.

Objectives.Description: Meet Nix One in the Smuggler's Cache (Car 13)
Deliver the trade goods to Nix Two

Name: SQ_Z1_TheRecitation
Description: Grandmother Sook-ja holds the Tail's oral history. Learn the stories before they are lost forever.

Objectives.Description: Collect 3 memory tokens from Tail elders

Name: SQ_Z1_FreezerBreach
Description: Car 11's insulation has failed. Survive the freezing cold to retrieve trapped supplies before hypothermia claims you.

Objectives.Description: Craft or find cold protection gear
Enter Car 11 and reach the supply cache
Escape before cold exposure reaches critical

Name: SQ_Z1_ZhorasBetterFormula
Description: Zhora believes she can create a safer version of Kronole. Help her gather ingredients from the Kronole Den's hidden stashes.

Objectives.Description: Talk to Zhora in the Kronole Den (Car 12)

Name: SQ_Z2_WorkerSolidarity
Description: The factory workers need proof that conditions can improve. Recover safety equipment from an abandoned storage car.

Objectives.Description: Talk to Ivan Borodin at the factory (Car 22)

Name: SQ_Z2_PitFighter
Description: Prove yourself in the Third Class fighting pit. Three rounds, three opponents, one reputation.

Objectives.Description: Enter the Pit and speak to the Pit Boss (Car 20)

Name: SQ_Z2_SwitchbladeNetwork
Description: Cora 'Switchblade' Mendez runs the Third Class black market. Help her identify a Jackboot informant.

Name: SQ_Z2_TheSchoolcar
Description: Third Class children haven't had a teacher in two years. Help organize a school and find educational materials.

Objectives.Description: Clear the abandoned car for the school

Name: SQ_Z2_WaterReclamation
Description: Third Class water recycler is failing. Find replacement parts before rationing gets worse.

Objectives.Description: Find a replacement filter in maintenance tunnels
Repair the recycler (requires CUN 10 or Yuki)

Name: SQ_Z2_GrigorysLedger
Description: The Pit boss Grigory Petrov keeps records of every fighter's debts. Steal the ledger to free the fighters — or use it as leverage.

Objectives.Description: Learn about the ledger from a pit fighter

Name: SQ_Z2_BrokenBulkhead
Description: A structural failure in Car 24 threatens to depressurize the car. Seal the breach before the cold gets in.

Objectives.Description: Seal the breach before cold exposure kills

Name: SQ_Z2_KesslersFaith
Description: Brother Kessler needs help protecting his congregation from Ezra's hardline doctrine. Gather evidence of the chapel's community value.

Name: SQ_Z3_WhispersGame
Description: A mysterious Second Class operative offers access to the Surveillance Hub — for a price.

Objectives.Description: Follow the dead drops to contact Whisper
Complete Whisper's test: retrieve a package from Car 37
Meet Whisper in the Surveillance Hub (Car 44)

Name: SQ_Z3_TheForgery
Description: A Second Class artisan can forge transit passes that bypass checkpoints. Help him gather materials.

Objectives.Description: Meet the Forger in his workshop (Car 35)
Steal ink from the Bureaucracy print shop (Car 40)
Find a genuine pass to copy

Name: SQ_Z3_OkonkwosSon
Description: Emeka Okonkwo, the magistrate's son, is a Kronole addict hiding in the lower levels. Finding him changes the trial.

Objectives.Description: Hear rumors about Emeka from Second Class residents
Search the lower maintenance corridors of Cars 33-36
Find Emeka in his hiding place
Decide: help Emeka recover or use him as leverage

Name: SQ_Z3_TheCensus
Description: The official passenger count doesn't match reality. Find the census discrepancy records to prove systematic erasure.

Name: SQ_Z3_VossShadow
Description: Melena Voss is hunting you. Learn her patrol patterns and set a trap — or evade her entirely.

Objectives.Description: Identify Voss's agents in Second Class
Set up a diversion or ambush

Name: SQ_Z3_LibrarianSecret
Description: Konstantin Volkov guards more than books. Earn his trust to access the restricted Archive section.

Objectives.Description: Debate Konstantin on the value of historical truth (CHA 8)

Name: SQ_Z3_ArtOfResistance
Description: A Second Class painter is creating revolutionary art in secret. Protect her work from Jackboot censors.

Objectives.Description: Meet the painter in her hidden studio (Car 38)
Distract the Jackboot patrol during the mural painting

Name: SQ_Z4_SashasStory
Description: A former Engine child escaped to the Working Spine. Find her and learn the truth about what happens inside the machine.

Objectives.Description: Follow maintenance crew rumors about 'the small one'
Find Sasha's hiding spot in the ventilation system (Car 53)
Earn Sasha's trust (provide food and warmth)

Name: SQ_Z4_GearsWorkshop
Description: The Working Spine's veteran mechanic has a lead on the infrastructure saboteur. Help her investigate.

Objectives.Description: Meet Gears at the Maintenance Hub (Car 52)

Name: SQ_Z4_ColdLabExperiment
Description: Dr. Holst's Cold Lab contains temperature data from outside. Help calibrate the sensors for accurate readings.

Objectives.Description: Retrieve sensor modules from exterior access panels
Install sensors in 3 external positions (cold exposure risk)
Return to Dr. Holst for data analysis

Name: SQ_Z4_TheBrig
Description: The Working Spine brig holds political prisoners from all classes. Free them or leave them.

Objectives.Description: Obtain brig keys from the guard post
Free the prisoners (or negotiate their release)

Name: SQ_Z4_IronsideExpedition
Description: Ironside, a Thaw Believer scout, claims to have survived an exterior walk. Find proof.

Objectives.Description: Meet Ironside at the Exterior Access Point (Car 58)
Find corroborating evidence in the Cold Lab

Name: SQ_Z4_ArmoryRaid
Description: A Jackboot armory in the Working Spine is lightly guarded during shift change. Steal weapons for the revolution.

Objectives.Description: Enter during the shift change window

Name: SQ_Z5_TheSoiree
Description: Infiltrate a First Class dinner party to gather blackmail material on the elite.

Objectives.Description: Attend the party without blowing your cover
Steal documents from the host's study

Name: SQ_Z5_ThePainting
Description: Lord Ashworth's Rothko has been stolen by a Third Class servant. Art, theft, and class collide.

Objectives.Description: Speak to Lord Ashworth about the theft (Car 75)
Find the servant who stole the painting

Name: SQ_Z5_SorensensResearch
Description: Dr. Sorensen's population sustainability research needs field data from across the train.

Objectives.Description: Meet Dr. Sorensen in the Medical Suite (Car 66)
Collect birth rate data from Second and Third Class
Collect mortality data from the Tail records

Name: SQ_Z5_PembertonCharity
Description: Lord Pemberton secretly sends food surpluses to Third Class. Help him organize the next delivery.

Objectives.Description: Collect surplus food from willing First Class donors
Navigate the delivery route past Jackboot checkpoints
Deliver the food to Third Class

Name: SQ_Z5_DrawerWake
Description: A Drawer prisoner's family wants them back. Help navigate the complex medical process of safe awakening.

Objectives.Description: Find the prisoner's Drawer number in the records
Assist Dr. Sorensen with the awakening procedure

Name: SQ_Z5_WinecellarMystery
Description: Someone is poisoning First Class wine stocks. Investigate before the next dinner party turns deadly.

Objectives.Description: Identify the poison compound (requires PER 10 or Marta)

Name: SQ_Z6_EmbersFaith
Description: Sister Ember represents the Order's reform wing. Help her build support among moderate Acolytes.

Objectives.Description: Meet Sister Ember in the lower Sanctum (Car 85)
Find evidence of Ezra's chemical exposure
Help Ember deliver her reform sermon

Name: SQ_Z6_HelenasFrosts
Description: Helena Frost's genetic research contains both horror and hope. Navigate the eugenics lab's records.

Name: SQ_Z6_TheAcolytesConfession
Description: A senior Acolyte wants to defect but fears Ezra's retribution. Protect them during their escape.

Objectives.Description: Receive the coded message in the Confession Hall
Meet the Acolyte at the designated rendezvous
Escort the Acolyte past 3 patrol checkpoints

Name: SQ_Z6_EnginePilgrimage
Description: The Order allows select pilgrims to approach the Engine room. Use the pilgrimage to map the defenses.

Objectives.Description: Map 4 defensive positions along the route

Name: SQ_Z6_LukasToy
Description: A child in the Engine left a toy bear behind before being taken. Find it and return it — a small mercy in a vast machine.

Objectives.Description: Learn about Luka from a maintenance worker
Deliver the bear to Luka inside the Engine

Name: SQ_Z4_SupplyTrainHeist
Description: A scheduled supply transfer between cars creates a window to redirect resources to the revolution.

Objectives.Description: Get the supply schedule from a sympathetic clerk

Name: SQ_Z3_DeadMansSwitch
Description: A Second Class engineer built a failsafe into the train's communication system. Find it before the Jackboots do.

Objectives.Description: Find the failsafe device in the communications relay
Decide: activate, disable, or modify the failsafe

Name: SQ_Z5_GardenOfEden
Description: First Class maintains a hydroponic garden. Steal seeds for the lower classes or negotiate access for all.

Objectives.Description: Decide: steal seeds, negotiate shared access, or expand the garden

Name: SQ_Z2_ForgottenDead
Description: A sealed car in Third Class contains the bodies of those who died in the second revolt. Families want closure.

Objectives.Description: Learn about the sealed car from Third Class elders
Open the sealed car (requires STR 12 or tools)
Identify the dead and report to families

Name: SQ_Z1_GilliamsChess
Description: Gilliam plays chess against himself every evening. Beat him to earn his respect and unlock bonus dialogue options.

Name: SQ_Z3_MuseumCar
Description: Second Class preserves artifacts from the old world. A curator offers access in exchange for a specific item.

Objectives.Description: Find the missing exhibit piece (a pre-Freeze music box)
Return the music box for full Museum access

Name: SQ_Z4_RosasData
Description: Rosa, a Thaw Believer botanist, has been growing plants in exterior-temperature conditions. Her results could change everything.

Objectives.Description: Find Rosa's greenhouse in the maintenance corridors (Car 59)
Protect the greenhouse from Jackboot inspection

Name: SQ_Z5_AshworthSecret
Description: Vivienne's father Lord Ashworth keeps a locked room. What's inside reveals the elite's darkest bargain with Wilford.

Objectives.Description: Learn about the locked room from servants (Car 75)
Find the key or pick the lock (CUN 12)
Discover the contents of the room
Decide what to do with the information

Name: SQ_Z6_FinalTransmission
Description: The train's long-range radio has been picking up a repeating signal. Someone is alive out there.

Objectives.Description: Decide: respond, record, or ignore the transmission

Name: SQ_Z1_CouncilPolitics
Description: The Tail Council is split on strategy. Mediate the factions or pick a side.

Objectives.Description: Speak to Samuel about military strategy

Name: SQ_Z3_TheGambler
Description: A Second Class gambler owes dangerous debts. Win the pot or help him escape before his creditors collect.

Objectives.Description: Meet the Gambler in the social car (Car 37)
Win 3 rounds at the card table (CUN 10)

Name: SQ_Z5_SpaConspriacy
Description: First Class spa treatments use a sedative compound. The same compound is in the protein blocks. Investigate the connection.

Objectives.Description: Collect a sample of the spa compound
Compare with protein block compound (requires Marta or PER 12)

Name: SQ_Z4_BrassInTheBrig
Description: A former Jackboot officer sits in the brig with valuable intelligence. He'll trade information for his freedom.

Objectives.Description: Verify Brass's claims with 2 independent sources
Decide: free Brass, leave him, or use him
